availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 3 ; 9 April - 25 May 1864

body.p:
72
April 19th 4
Dr Wm Forrester
Surgeon 5th Ky Cavl.
Murfreesboro, Tenn
Dr

Your communication of the 10th inst addressed to his Excellency the Governor, has been referred to me for reply. I have written Dr W A. Locken formerly of the Ky Cavl. to appear before Baird at Louisville Ky preperatory to his appointment as asst surg of your regiment. He is represented as a young and energetic man and a graduate of the Louisville Medical College. If his examination proves satisfactory he will be commissioned and ordered to report immediately for duty.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
